let textTest = `Hi, my name is Josip.
I'm a highscool junior developer,
eager in learning new skills and getting more experience.
I started off as a robotician
learning to appreciate good quality code.
That eventually lead to me becoming a web developer` let textHoby = `Although almost all of my projects are made in JavaScript
I consider myself a python developer and a linux enthusiast
` export { textTest, textHoby }
